doc:
Gerome Ragni https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerome_Ragni 0 Gerome Ragni (born Jerome Bernard Ragni; September 11, 1935 – July 10, 1991) was an American actor, singer and songwriter, best known as co-writer of the 1960s musical Hair: The American Tribal Love-Rock Musical. Gerome_Ragni ( born Jerome_Bernard_Ragni ; September_11_,_1935 – July_10_,_1991 ) was an_American_actor , singer_and_songwriter , best_known as co-writer of the_1960s_musical_Hair : The_American_Tribal_Love-Rock_Musical .
